short_summary: Request for an offer to purchase barley.",
description: Seeking offers to obtain barley on its farm for the 2023 season. Tender due October 16, 2023 at 02:00 pm Eastern Daylight Time. Mandatory details to begin contract. ...,
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Offer to Purchase – Barley

**Reference Number:** cb-373-50857131

**Solicitation Number:** 01B46-23-140

**Publication Date:** 29 September 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time:** 16 October 2023, 2:00 pm (EDT)

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is soliciting tenders for the purchase of barley for its Fredericton Research Farm. The purchase is for the 2023 season.

**Scope of Work:**
The AAFC Fredericton Research Farm, located at 95 Innovation Road, Fredericton, New Brunswick, E3B 4Z7, is seeking to purchase barley. Interested bidders must obtain the related specifications, plans, and drawings, and all other tender documents through the Canadabuys service provider.

**Submission Requirements:**
Sealed tenders must be submitted to aafc.escprocurement-cseapprovisionnement.aac@canada.ca by the tender closing date and time. Bidders must not contact individuals other than the AAFC Contract Officer for information and inquiries.

**Important Notice:**
- Mandatory registration with Canadabuys is required.
- Tenders must be submitted electronically.
- AAF reserves the right to accept or reject any or all proposals without prior negotiation.

**Contracting Entity Information:**

*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
*   **Address:** 2001 Boulevard Robert-Bourassa, Room 671-CP, Montréal, Quebec H3A 3N2, Canada
*   **Contact:** Jacques Toussaint, Contract Officer, agr.gc.ca.ca, JJacques.toussaint@agr.gc.ca, Phone: (438) 455-8237

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21004/offer-to-purchase-01b46-23-140-barley.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/21004/offer-to-purchase-01b46-23-140-barley.pdf) is the link to the tender document.

Please note that the tender has expired.
